message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90%, and you get 10%. We can always adjust in the next round.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is a much fairer starting point. Consider that the value decreases in each round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give you more than 350,000.  Remember, each round the money is worth less. Let's make a deal before it's too late.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you more than half. Take this deal before inflation eats away at the pot even further!
